title: 苹果紧急修复影响Safari的零日漏洞攻击
title_translated: Apple emergency repairs to the zero-day breach that affected Safari.
summary: A high-risk loophole (CVE-2025-6558) has been used for a zero-day attack against Google Chrome users, allowing attackers to escape through carefully constructed HTML pages.

title: 微软 Office 漏洞允许攻击者执行远程代码
title_translated: Microsoft Office bug allows the assailant to execute remote code
summary: Several key loopholes in Microsoft Office may allow attackers to enforce random codes on affected systems.

title: 美国CISA警告 SinoTrack GPS 跟踪器存在远程控制漏洞
title_translated: US CISA warning SinoTrack GPS tracker has remote control gaps
summary: SinoTrack GPS equipment has critical loopholes that allow remote control and tracking, as well as fuel pump cutoff. Default passwords and device identifiers can be exploited to compromise the devices.

title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
title_translated: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
summary: Cisco ISE contains an injection vulnerability that allows remote code execution and obtaining root privileges on affected devices.

title: Palo Alto Networks GlobalProtect App: CVE-2025-2179: Non Admin User Can Disable the GlobalProtect App
title_translated: Palo Alto Networks GlobalProtect App: CVE-2025-2179: Non Admin User Can Disable the GlobalProtect App
summary: An incorrect privilege assignment vulnerability enables a locally authenticated non-administrative user to disable the app, affecting Linux devices.
